categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Imperial Remnant

nodes.text: Sabmin Devist was a clone of Soontir Fel.

He was part of a sleeper cell of Fel clones planted by Grand Admiral Thrawn on the planet Pakrik Minor. He informed his "brother" Carib Devist of their reactivation, after which Carib asked to meet all of the other members of their sleeper cell, Dobrow, Tabric and Hovarb. He along with all other members of Jenth-44 opted to aid the New Republic on the grounds that they be left alone.
